long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you tired of password rules? Now you can use any password you want! LitPass takes a little password such as "tree" and converts it to a strong password such as "#_4PeG!@9U8Wd6M". It's repeatable any time you need it, it's irreversible and safe from nefarious/ignorant administrators. It's like a password manager but doesn't have the negative side-effects of a password manager.
